artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: building on stilts; left side upper section supported by pillars; central staircase leading to upper level; "ECOLE" above entry at top of stairs; "GARÇON" on left side, "FILLES" on right side; clock at top of central facade; yellow door lower level below stairs
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [ÉCOLE PRIMAIRE]
title: École primaire, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
